entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.49
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Zugferd fixes
  • Prevent Client and Contact names from duplicating on PDFs
  • New React UI
  • v5.11.49 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10727

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.48...v5.11.49
